tool.name: Export result of cg/wgMLST database
tool.command: wgMLST #if $export_result.export == "distance" distance #end if #if $export_result.export == "mlst" mlst #if $export_result.mlsttype == "grapetree" -f grapetree #end if #end if #if $export_result.export == "strain" strain #if $export_result.count -c #end if #end if #if $export_result.export == "gene" gene #end if #if str($mincover) -m $mincover #end if #if $keep -k #end if #if $inverse -V #end if #if $duplicate -d #end if '${database}' > '${$output}' #if $log 2> '${logfile}' #end if

param.name: export
param.label: Select the data export
param.option: Distance matrix between strains on the cg/wgMLST database
cg/wgMLST table for each strain on the cg/wgMLST database
List of the strains on the cg/wgMLST database
List of the genes on the cg/wgMLST database

param.name: count
param.label: Report the number of gene found for each strain

param.name: mincover
param.label: Minimun number of strain found to keep a gene

param.name: keep
param.label: Keep only gene with different allele

param.name: inverse
param.label: Keep only gene that not meet the filter of mincover or keep options

tool.help:
**What it does**
Extract element from a cg/wgMLST DATABASE: - an distance matrix - an MLST table - a gene list - an strains list
Options: -m, --mincover INTEGER Minimun number of strain found to keep a gene (default:0) -k, --keep Keep only gene with different allele (omit missing). -d, --duplicate Conserve duplicate gene (default remove). -V, --inverse Keep only gene that do not meet the filter of mincover or keep options.
-c, --count Count the number of gene present in the database for each strains.
